name: Hellmunculus [ALPHA_0.1]
description:
Game made as a Final Project for our Second Semester of Game Development major.

This is a very early build, with some bugs we are working on solving.

Future Plans for the game:

- Fix the bugs (Of course);

- Make more levels and enemies;

- Make a world map with roguelite elements (Shop for Items, new powers etc);

- Improve the UI (It's pretty confusing at the moment).

Game made by

  Capybaras Can Play

Flávi Milani 

Luis Gustavo Bortolette Costa

Leo Reis Martins

Erick Carotenuto Adami
